title: Start
RumourShiba
body: The Shibas are proud of their reputation for being strong and independent.

title: Spring
body:
<<if $spring_talk==0>>
Player: What a lovely hotspring.

<<elseif $spring_talk==1>>
Player: I wonder how long it's been there?

<<else>>
Player: It looks like a bottomless hole.

<<endif>>

<<set $spring_talk += 1>>

title: Shop
body:
<<if $game_state == "start">>
[[Shop.Start]]
<<$game_state == "find cure">>
[[Shop.FindCure]]
<<elseif $game_state == "cure found">>
[[Shop.CureFound]]
<<elseif $game_state == "gave cure to cat">>
[[Shop.GaveSpellToCat]]
<<elseif $game_state == "gave cure to shop">>
[[Shop.GaveSpellToMerchant]]
<<endif>>

title: Cat
body:
<<if $game_state == "start" or $game_state == "find cure">>
[[Cat.StartOrFindCure]]
<<elseif $game_state == "cure found">>
[[Cat.CureFound]]
<<elseif $game_state == "gave cure to cat">>
[[Cat.GaveSpellToCat]]
<<elseif $game_state == "gave cure to merchant">>
[[Cat.GaveSpellToMerchant]]
<<endif>>

title: Shop.Start
body:
<<if $shop_talk == 0>>

//if not spoken to shop yet then don't know who the merchant is
<<if $cat_talk == 0>>
Merchant: Welcome to my shop! What can I do for you? Need some items? Or maybe you want to sell something? I will give you a good price!

title: Cat.StartOrFindCure
body:
<<if visited("Cat.StartOrFindCure")==false>>
<<set $cat_talk to 0>>
<<endif>>

<<if $cat_talk==0>>
Player: What's this weird statue?
Cat: Hey! Could you please help me?
Player: Woah! This statue can talk?
Cat: Well, that was amistake.
Cat: Tried to turn this rat I caught into a stone, but it backfired!
-> Why did you want to turn this rat into stone?
    Cat: Because he's a thief! 
-> Oh no! That's awful!
    Cat: It's not great! I can't eat anything now.
Player: Is there something I can do?
Cat: Well, I always have a backup plan.
Cat: I stashed a spell reversal scroll somewhere around here.
-> That's useful.
    Cat: Always is! But I don't remember where!
->Where?
    Cat: I can't remember! 
<<endif>>
<<set $game_state to "find cure">>

<<if $game_state=="find cure">>
Player: How can I help you?
<<endif>>

Cat: I accidentally turned myself into a statue! 
Cat: I need some holy water to turn myself back, Can you help?

-> I..guess?
Cat: Thank you so much! I can't offer you any money unfortunately, but I owe you a favour!

-> How did you turn yourself into a statue?? 
<<if $game_state!="find cure">>
Cat: I don't know! I've never done anything like this before.
Cat: I turned flowers into cats, but everyone loved that!

-> I'm looking for some holy water myself! 
<<if $game_state=="find cure">>
Cat: Oh, that's great! You are so kind!

<<elseif $cat_talk==1>>
Cat: I'm not sure where to find it! Maybe near the temple?

<<elseif $cat_talk==2>>
Cat: Did you find the cure yet? I don't want to be a statue forever! 

<<else>>
Cat: Please help me find the cure!

<<endif>>
<<set $cat_talk+=1>>

title: Cat.CureFound
body:
<<if visited("Cat.CureFound") is false>>
<<set $cat_talk to 0>>
<<endif>>

<<if $cat_talk == 0>>
Cat: Oh! YOu found the cure! How wonderful! 
<<endif>>

Cat: Can you put it in my hand so I can cast it?
-> Sure!
    Cat: Great!
<<set $game_state = "gave cure to cat">>

-> Um, not yet. Maybe later.
    Cat: Oh? Please give it to me when you're ready! Don't take too long, then. 
<<set $cat_talk += 1>>

title: Cat.GaveSpellToCat
body:
<<if visited("Cat.GaveSpellToCat") is false>>
<<set $cat_talk to 0>>
<<endif>>

<<if $cat_talk == 0>>
Cat: Thank you! 
<<elseif $cat_talk == 0>>
Cat: I can't thank you enough!
<<else>>
Cat: Thanks again!
<<endif>>
<<set $cat_talk += 1>>

title: Cat.GaveSpellToMerchant
body:
<<if visited("Cat.GaveSpellToMerchant") is false>>
<<set $cat_talk to 0>>
<<endif>>

<<if $cat_talk == 0>>
Cat: You've sold it?
<<elseif $cat_talk == 0>>
Cat: Do you have any idea what that means for me?
<<else>>
Cat: I'm going to stay like this forever!
<<endif>>
<<set $cat_talk += 1>>

title: Shop.FindCure
body:
<<if visited("Shop.FindCure") is false>>
<<set $shop_talk to 0>>
<<endif>>

<<if $shop_talk == 0>>
Merchant: Did you find the thing yet?

title: Shop.CureFound
body:
<<if visited("Shop.CureFound") is false>>
<<set $shop_talk to 0>>
<<endif>>

<<if $shop_talk == 0>>
Merchant: Oh! Look at this! What a wonderful find! 
Merchant: I will pay handsome money for it!
<<else>>
Merchant: Can you sell it to me?
<<endif>>

-> Sure!
    Merchant: Excellent!
<<set $game_state = "gave cure to shop">>

-> Maybe later.
    Merchant: Oh? Please sell it to me when you're ready!
<<set $Shop_talk += 1>>

title: Shop.GaveSpellToCat
body:
<<if visited("Shop.GaveSpellToCat") is false>>
<<set $shop_talk to 0>>
<<endif>>

<<if $shop_talk == 0>>
Merchant: You've made a big mistake.
Merchant: I would have made you rich!
<<elseif $shop_talk == 1>>
Merchant: You're going to make so much profit!
<<else>>
Merchant: *angry muttering*
<<endif>>

<<set $Shop_talk += 1>>

title: Shop.GaveSpellToMerchant
body:
<<if visited("Shop.GaveSpellToMerchant") is false>>
<<set $shop_talk to 0>>
<<endif>>

<<if $shop_talk == 0>>
Merchant: I'm so happy!
Merchant: Here, have lots of money!
<<elseif $shop_talk == 1>>
Merchant: I'm going to make so much profit!
<<else>>
Merchant: Thanks!
<<endif>>

<<set $Shop_talk += 1>>

title: CureLocation
body:
<<if $game_state == "start">>
Player: This looks weird.
<<elseif $game_state == "find cure">>
Player: Looks like something is hidden there.
<<set $game_state = "cure found">>
<<else>>
Player: There's nothing here.
<<endif>>
